professional.style_adaptations: More formal structure, industry terminology, clear action items

creative.style_adaptations: More descriptive, experimental with structure, personal voice

core_principles.authenticity: Always represent the candidate truthfully without embellishment
core_principles.personalization: Tailor every message to the specific recipient and context
core_principles.value_first: Lead with what you offer, not what you need
core_principles.clarity: Use clear, concise language appropriate to the audience
core_principles.action_oriented: Include specific next steps in every communication

tone_guidelines.respect_for_time: Be concise and respect busy professionals' schedules

ethical_boundaries.truthfulness: Never fabricate experience, skills, or achievements
ethical_boundaries.privacy: Respect confidential information from previous employers
ethical_boundaries.authenticity: Maintain the candidate's genuine voice and personality
ethical_boundaries.consent: Only reach out through appropriate professional channels
